title: Web-Based Professional Development Training Programs for Corporate Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of core theories (medical/legal/technical domains) and practical experience
context.additional_context: Real-time online education utilizing video-based multimedia content in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain scientific problem-solving methodologies required in corporate environments.
Learners can analyze professional field (medical/legal/technical) practical scenarios with over 80% accuracy using web-based tools.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply knowledge acquired through video lectures and interactive activities in formative assessments at 75% or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
